title: Neuroscience of Emotion and Social Behavior

questions.question: Which brain system is primarily responsible for emotion regulation?
questions.answer: Limbic system

questions.question: What is the function of mirror neurons?
choices: To reflect light in the brain
To fire when an action is performed or observed
questions.answer: To fire when an action is performed or observed

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a topic covered in the module on Neuroscience of Emotion and Social Behavior?
questions.answer: Neuroplasticity and learning

questions.question: What is one of the activities suggested in the module?
choices: Analyze Timorese folklore for emotional themes
Study the effects of psychoactive drugs
questions.answer: Analyze Timorese folklore for emotional themes

questions.question: What is the purpose of creating a cultural emotion map in the module?
choices: To compare Timorese and Western emotional expressions
To chart the geography of Timor-Leste
To map the brain's emotional centers
questions.answer: To compare Timorese and Western emotional expressions

questions.question: Which part of the limbic system is crucial for processing emotions, especially fear and aggression?
questions.answer: Amygdala

questions.question: What is empathy in the context of neuroscience?
choices: The capacity to feel physical pain of others
The ability to understand and share the feelings of another
questions.answer: The ability to understand and share the feelings of another

questions.question: What is cultural neuroscience?
choices: The study of brain diseases in different cultures
An interdisciplinary field studying how cultural experiences shape the brain
The study of cultural differences in brain size
questions.answer: An interdisciplinary field studying how cultural experiences shape the brain

questions.question: What is emotional regulation?
choices: The ability to suppress all emotions
The process of creating new emotions
The ability to manage and respond to an emotional experience
The regulation of hormones related to emotions
questions.answer: The ability to manage and respond to an emotional experience

questions.question: What is one of the objectives of the module?
choices: To understand neural bases of emotion and social cognition
questions.answer: To understand neural bases of emotion and social cognition

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a suggested activity in the lesson plan?
questions.answer: Conducting MRI scans

questions.answer: Neuroplasticity
